mapper.sql: id, issue, start_time, end_time, status, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from guess order by create_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into guess
id,
issue,
start_time,
end_time,
status,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update guess
issue = #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update guess set issue = #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
